tag_list: web-directory, link-directory, free-links, deep-links, reciprocal-links, link-exchange, feature-links
overview:
Hello everyone, My name is Kendall McGill, CEO of Links2us.com which is a link exchange web directory. I started this business in February 2012 to help small business and website owners with helping their websites get a better search engine placement.

I was always good at helping family and friends with different kinds of business advice for at least the past eleven years. So then one day I just decided why not help other business and individuals just on a larger scale, as their you have it Links2us!

I really enjoy working for myself and helping others at the same time. I really wish I had this dream to do this years ago! Well maybe that wan’t the right time of something.

If ever your just surfing the net, stop by and check us out and see for yourself what we are really about. Just remember Links2us.com where we proud ourselves on helping small business and website owners make the most of the vast use of the World Wide Web.

Kendall McGill, CEO Links2us.com
